## Discussion

Include multiple URLs to request access to multiple shares simultaneously. The server processes each URL independently.

# shareURLs

**Instance Property**

The URLs of the shares to request access to.

## Declaration

```swift
var shareURLs: [URL]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Include multiple URLs to request access to multiple shares simultaneously. The server processes each URL independently.
title: shareURLs
